Html:
Hello and thank you for making such a great toolkit. But I am having some problem while installing it. I am using Windows 8 64 bit Professional version And .net 4.5 is installed on it. When I try to add the NAudio library from nuget, it shows me error. " 'NAudio' could not be installed because it is not compatible with any project in the solution. The project targets the following frameworks: .NETFramework,Version=v3.5
Windows,Version=v8.0 "

I have installed .NETFramework 3.5 manually later but still the problem exists. Can you give me any solution to this or can tell me what I am doing wrong please? I am making the App for Windows Phone 8 using XAML.
hi NAudio doesn't include Windows phone support at the moment I'm afraid

markheath wrote:
hi NAudio doesn't include Windows phone support at the moment I'm afraid
Any plans to support it?

would love to, but NAudio is just a spare time project for me, so it must compete with a lot of other demands on my time. I'm hoping that as the Windows Phone and WinRT APIs gradually move closer together, this will become an easier task.
